competitors.name: Qualys
competitors.notes: One of the 'big three' in vulnerability management, cloud-based platform

competitors.name: Rapid7 Nexpose
competitors.notes: Vulnerability management with real-time risk assessment

competitors.name: OpenVAS
competitors.notes: Open-source fork of Nessus 2, created after Nessus closed source in 2005

competitors.name: Acunetix
competitors.notes: Web application security for vulnerabilities in web apps and APIs

context: By 2015, vulnerability management market had matured. The 'big three' (Tenable, Qualys, Rapid7) established themselves. Nessus recognized as gold standard with superior scanning capabilities. Market included both network-focused scanners and specialized application security tools.
